4313690.name: Son of Man
4313690.description:
Experience Jesus life like never before, as a son of man, of flesh and blood.

Walk through 2,5 D scenarios of the 1st century Judea and Galilee, and see historical objects and places. — Recreated as faithfull as possible.

Work, sleep and eat.

Navigate through the Sea of Galilee.

Make signs and heal the sick.

Pass through temptations and nightmares.

Participate in parties and play games like ancient Dreidel and others.
4313690.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
